name: My Friend Chinto
description:
Strolling through the forest our character has wandered into a forest of talking trees and singing flowers. Although the creatures seem harmless at first, they are quick to anger. And suddenly when our character is about to be attacked his old imaginary friend comes to his aid.

Battle Phase:

Try to press the interact key when the moving pointer is on the sword icon or the fire icon, it will damage the enemy.  Avoid the skull icon, it damages you.

Keys:

[R] to restart game

[Space] or [Left mouse button] to interact

[Escape] or [P] to pause

Known bugs:

During dialogue if the interact button is pressed before the sentence completes gibberish is thrown onto the display. Please allow the dialogue a second to complete. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
